intro: This is an unusual use for a laser pointer or laser cat toy. When you are done painting your first or only coat of paint your helper (spouse) can just point the laser at the missed spots. This saves a lot of "up and to the right....no no more to the right..." We've used this technique several times.
intro_items: This is an unusual use for a laser pointer or laser cat toy. We've used this technique several times.
